alert.note: Alert for Clay; Effingham; Jasper (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 5:43PM CDT until July 29 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jasper County in southeastern Illinois... Clay County in south central Illinois... Southern Effingham County in south central Illinois... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 542 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Shobonier to 10 miles east of Centralia to near Zeigler, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Edgewood, Iola, Louisville, Bible Grove and Ingraham. This includes Interstate 57 between mile markers 143 and 150. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
